DEPARTMENT OF COMPUTER SCIENCE AND ENGINEERING
Date: 30-07-2025

To
‘The Registrar

Siddhartha Academy of Higher Education, Deemed to be University
Kenuru, Vijayawada - 07

(Through Proper Channel)

Subject: Precautionary Information Regarding Proc
at campus.

n Digging Works

Dear Sir,

This is to inform you that proclain digging works are being carried out in our
institution, As the inteet OFC (Optical Fibre cables) are laid underground,
there is a high risk of these cables being damaged during such digging activities,
Any damage may cause serious internet interruptions across the campus

OFC cable restoration is a challenging and time-intensive process, and any
damage oxn lead (0 major disruptions in the institute’s internet services. Prior
intimation and coordination with the Central Server Room are essential to avoid
such interruptions.

Contact persons for coordination:

1, Mr. P. S, Ramacharyulu, CSE ~ 92462 99918
2, Mr. P, Anil Kumar, CSE ~ 94949 43274

Hence, We kindly request you to forward this information to the concerned
maintenance team and ensure they inform/coordinate the Central Server Room
in advance whenever any proclain ot digging work is planned, so that necessary
precautions can be taken to protect the OFC cables.

‘Thanking You
Yours sincerely,

(Dr.D.Rajeswara Rao)

Dr. M. Raviehand, 4... 7.9
REGISTRAR

CIRCULAR
Subject: Prohibition of Unauthorised Use of Posters, Decorations, and Wall Pasting in University

Premises

Ithas been observed on several occasions that during the organisation of events such as Freshers’ Day;
Farewell Parties, FDPs, Conferences, Seminars, Welcome Parties, Dussehra, Sankranti, Supragna,
Annual Day, and other celebrations, students are using decoration items and pasting posters on the walls
and doors of the University buildings. Such practices are leaving scars and permanent marks on the walls,
thereby affecting the aesthetics and overall appearance of our university premises.

All students are hereby strictly warned not to paste papers, banners, or any decorative material on the
walls, doors, or any other surface of the University during the conduct of events. Any decoration without
te.

prior written approval from the University authorities is strictly prol

Violation of this instruction will lead 10:
1), Disciplinary action against the concerned students.
2). Imposition of a fine on the concerned batch of students responsible for the damage.

‘All Heads of Departments and Faculty Members are requested to create awareness among students
regarding this matter and ensure compliance. Preserving the neatness and aesthetic appeal of the

University is the shared responsibility ofall members ofthe University community

By Order

Za chand
ae elas

Siddhartha Academy of Higher Education

(Deemed to be University)

Subject: Request for Approval (o Procure 4 Analog Cameras for Godavari Girls
Hostel ~ Reg,

Respected Sir,

This is to bring to your kind notice that there is a requirement for instalation of
4 analog cameras at Godavari Hostel to cover a total of three critical locations,
namely the grocery store room, the kitchen room (inside), and the kitchen:
entry point, These cameras are essential to ensure proper utilization of
provisions, uphold hygiene standards in the kitchen, and provide effective
‘monitoring at the kitehen entry point.

Quotations have been obtained from the following vendors:
1, M/s, Anvi Technologies - & 20,500/-
2. Mis, Shiva Sai Computers ~ & 25,875.04/-
3. M/s. T&T Enterprises ~ 8 24,898/-

‘Among these, M/s. Anvi Technologies has quoted the lowest price of %20,500/-,
inclusive of passive components and installation charges.

In view of the above, we request your kind approvel to proceed with the
procurement & installation from M/s. Anvi Technologies.

Thanking you.

Yours Sincerely

DEPARTMENT OF COMPUTER SCIENCE AND ENGINEERING
Date: 13-10-2025

To
‘The Registrar

Siddhartha Academy of Higher Education, Deemed to be University
Kanuru, Vijayawada - 07

(Through Proper Channel)

‘Subject: Submission of Bill — 29,616/- towards Airtel Air Fiber Internet
‘Subscription for Cyber Security Lab, 4" Floor, Dr V L Dutt Block.

Dear Sir,

This is to bring to your kind notice that we have successfully subscribed to en
Airtel Air Fiber Internet Plan for the Cyber Security Lab, 4th Floor,
Dr. V, L. Dutt Block,

+ Plan Duration; 28th June 2025 to 27th June 2026 (12 Months)

+ Subscription Amount: 29,616/-
An advance amount of %18,000/- was received earlier from the Registrar's
Otfice. We had also proposed for a Jio Air Fiber connection, but due to
technical feasibility issues, the connectivity could not be established. The Jio
technical team conducted a site survey but did not provide any further response,

In view of this, a separate cable was laid from the our Central Server Room,
and a second internet connection (M/s. Power Grid ) was provided to the
Cyber Security Lab for unintersupted connectivity.

Kindly find enclosed the payment receipts and plan details for your reference,

‘Thanking You

Yours sincerely,

(Dr.D.Rajeswara Rao)

text:
DEPARTMENT OF COMPUTER SCIENCE AND ENGINEERING
Date: 09-10-2025

To
‘The Registrar
Siddharths Academy of Higher Education, Deemed to be University
Kanuru, Vijayawada - 07

(Through Proper Channel)
Subject: Request for Renewal of ERNET Domain — vrsiddhartha.ac.in
Dear Sir,
This is to inform you that our domain ~ vesiddhartha.ac.in will expire on
07-12-2025, The domain is actively used for hosting our official website
(www.vrsiddhartha.ac.in), institute email services, and other integrated
essential applications’services. Hence, it is essential to renew the domain
immediately to ensure uninterrupted access to these online services
‘We are proposing a 9-years renewal at a total cost of 88,496/- (incl. all taxes).

As per the ERNET renewal process, the following documents are required to be
submitied/uploaded on the ERNET Registry Portal:
S.No | Document / Proof Required

1 Letter of Undertaking *

2 | Application Letter * (on Institute Letterhead, duly signed and
stamped by the Head of the Institute)

3__| Letter of Appointment of Admin *

4 | Registration Certificate establishing the legal constitution of the
Registrant *

5_| Affiliation Letter *

6 | Address Proof

We have to upload the scanned copies of the above documents on the ERNET
portal to complete the renewal process

Hence, itis requested to kindly grant permission for domain renewal and release
an advance amount of %8,496/- in favour of HOD, CSE for making the online
payment.

We also request support from the Registrar Office in preparing and signing the
required documents, so that the renewal can be completed at the earliest to
avoid any inconvenience due to service disruption.

Thanking You
Yours sincerely,

Enc!

1) Tasiff Details Copy -

2) List of Requized Documents for Renewal (rD.Rajeswara Rao)

3) Email Copy

text:
DEPARTMENT OF COMPUTER SCIENCE AND ENGINEERING
Date: 09-10-2025

To
‘The Registrar

Siddhartha Academy of Higher Education, Deemed to be University
Kenuru, Vijayawada - 07

(Through Proper Channel)

Subject: Submission of Bill Rs. 5,600/- towards Replacement of 8 Port PoE
Network Switch- Ground Floor, Ladies Hostel, Krishna Block.

Dear Sir,

This is to bring to your kind notice that Wi-Fi issues were observed at the

Ground Floor, Krishna Block (Ladies Hostel). The Wi-Fi Access Points were

frequently rebooting due to a failure in the existing Cisco 8-Port PoE Network

‘Switch, The PoE module in the switch was malfunctioning, causing the Access

Points to disconnect and reconnect repeatedly. As a result, students were facing

difficulty in accessing the internet continuously.

The existing switch was procured in 2018. Hence. it has been replaced with a

new TP-Link 8-Port PoE Network Switch, and the issue has now been resolved

in the Ground Floor of Krishna Block,

‘The new switch was procured from M/s. AAR Technologies, Vijayawada, at
